en.title: Fashion Sunglasses Testing
en.subTitle: AI’s dedicated inspection resources and HOKLAS accredited testing facilities offer extensive quality control services for fashion sunglasses
en.soloutionTitle: Eyewear Expertise – QC for Fashion Sunglasses
en.soloutionContent:
When choosing sunglasses, today’s consumers look for a combination of a fashionable design and good performance characteristics. Like any eyewear, sunglasses must be robust and safe, while providing appropriate protection from ultraviolet radiation. Ready-to-wear fashion sunglasses are usually supplied with non-prescription lenses, but many opticians also offer prescription sunglasses with optical lenses.

Sunglasses are categorized as Class 1 personal protection device under European Directive 89/686/EEC.

AI’s performance tests and lab tests help you ensure the quality and safety of your fashion sunglasses. Our professional inspectors and lab technicians will check your shipment’s compliance with all applicable international and national standards. The tests we offer include mechanical checks, optical tests, polarization checks, chemical analysis (including nickel release), aging tests, radiation exposure, and more.

Dedicated Eyewear Testing Labs and Inspector Resources

Our dedicated inspector resources and HOKLAS accredited laboratory facilities offer the largest available range of tests for ready-to-wear fashion sunglasses. We are certified to test eyewear to the ISO/IEC 17025 standard for Eyewear and Ophthalmic Products, and help you ensure compliance with all applicable international and national standards, including:

  • International: ISO 12312.1
  • Europe: EN 1836
  • USA: ANSI Z80.3
  • China: QB/T 2457
  • Taiwan: CNS 15097
  • Australia / New Zealand: AS/NZS 1067

AI’seyewear testing laboratory issues reports with HOKLAS and ILAC endorsement, which are recognized for CE Certification by the British Standards Institution and SAI Global, as well as by Benchmark Product Certification (Australia).

HOKLAS Certified Lab Testing for Fashion Sunglasses

AI’s dedicated HOKLAS certified testing laboratory offers a wide range of chemical, optical, mechanical and other tests to check the numerous characteristics of your fashion sunglasses, including:

  • Anti-abrasion coating, for ISO12312.1 (ISO12311)
  • Anti-reflective coating, for ISO 12312.1 (ISO12311) and EN1836
  • Blue-light blocking: ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067.
  • Children sunglasses tests: small parts, compression test, drop test, impact test, torque test, tensile test, sharp edge, sharp Point, flexure test (EN71.1)
  • Complete mechanical strength (bridge deformation and filter retention), for ISO 12312.1-2013 and EN1836
  • Haze (wide angle scattered light), for ISO12312.1-2013 (ISO12311)
  • Impact resistance, with drop ball, for ANSI Z80.3 and 21 CFR 801.410
  • Increased robustness, for EN1836
  • Lens categories, luminous transmittance and mean transmittance, for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067, ANSI Z80.3, QB2457, Japan labeling requirement, etc.
  • Lens mechanical strength (minimum robustness), for ISO 12312.1 (ISO12311) and EN1836
  • Lens surface quality, for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067, ANSI Z80.3, and QB2457
  • Mechanical strength levels 1, 2, 3, for ISO12312.1-2013 (ISO12311)
  • Nickel release, on complete sunglass frame, for EN12472 + EN16128, EN1836, and EN ISO 12312.1-2013 note
  • Optical density for ANSI Z80.3
  • Optical powers (refractive properties), with a focimeter or the optical-tester method, for ANSI Z80.3 and GB10810.3
  • Optical powers (spherical and astigmatic powers), with the telescope method, for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067, etc.
  • Other corrosion, color stability and mechanical tests
  • Polarizing plane axis, and polarizing ratio and efficiency, for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067, ANSI Z80.3, and GB10810.3.
  • Prismatic difference (imbalance): ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067, ANSI Z80.3, and QB2457
  • Resistance to ignition, for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067, etc.
  • Resistance to optical radiation (aging test), for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067, ANSI Z80.3, etc.
  • Robustness, for AS/NZS 1067
  • Scattered light (light diffusion test), for EN1836 and AS/NZS 1067
  • Transmittance uniformity (matching between two lenses), for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, and AS/NZS 1067
  • Transmittance variation in a single lens, for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, and AS/NZS 1067
  • UV/UVA/UVB blocking (UV range properties), for ISO 12312.1-2013, EN1836, AS/NZS 1067, ANSI Z80.3, and GB10810.3.

We can tailor all tests to your in-house specifications. Get in touch with us to get an instant quote for your testing program.

zh.title: 时尚太阳镜
zh.subTitle: AI亚检的专业检验团队和获得 HOKLAS 认证的实验室测试设备可为时尚太阳镜提供各种质量控制服务。
zh.soloutionTitle: 眼镜类产品检测专家——时尚太阳镜质量控制
zh.soloutionContent:
当今的消费者在选择太阳镜时，不仅会关注它是否具备出彩的设计，还会关注它是否具备出众的功能。正如其他眼镜产品一样，太阳镜不但应具备足够的防紫外线功能，还必须坚固耐用，安全可靠。成品时尚太阳镜通常使用平光镜片，但也有许多眼镜商提供配备了光学镜片的验光太阳镜。

根据欧洲指令 89/686/EEC，太阳镜属于一类个人防护设备。

AI亚检的性能测试和实验室测试可助您确保时尚太阳镜的质量和安全性达到标准要求。我们的专业检验员和实验室技术人员会按照所有可适用的国际标准和国内标准，对您产品的合格性进行检测。我们提供的测试项目涵盖力学检测、光学测试、偏光检测、化学分析（包括镍释出量）、老化测试，以及辐射受照量等其他更多方面。

专业的眼镜类产品测试实验室和检验团队

我们的专业检验团队和获得 HOKLAS 认证的实验室设备可为成品时尚太阳镜提供种类最齐全的各种测试服务。我们具备按照 ISO/IEC 17025 眼镜与眼科产品标准进行测试的资格，可助您确保产品符合所有可适用的国际标准和国内标准，包括：

  • 国际：ISO 12312.1
  • 欧洲：EN 1836
  • 美国：ANSI Z80.5
  • 中国：GB/T 2457
  • 中国台湾：CNS 15097
  • 澳大利亚/新西兰：AS/NZS 067

AI亚检的眼镜测试实验室可签发带 HOKLAS 与国际实验室认证联盟 (ILAC) 认可的各种报告，且这些报告亦获英国标准协会、SAI 国际认证集团 (SAI Global) 及基准产品认证（澳大利亚）的承认。

HOKLAS 认证的时尚太阳镜实验室测试

经 HOKLAS 认证的 AI 亚检专业测试实验室提供一系列化学、光学、力学及其他测试，可检测时尚太阳镜的众多特性，包括：

  • 防磨损涂层，标准：ISO12312.1 (ISO12311)
  • 防反射涂层，标准：ISO 12312.1 (ISO12311) 及 EN1836
  • 防蓝光，标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067.
  • 儿童太阳镜测试：微小部件、耐压测试、跌落测试、抗冲击测试、扭矩测试、拉力测试、锐边、尖角、弯曲测试 (EN71.1)
  • 整体机械强度（中梁变形与滤镜保持性）测试，标准：ISO 12312.1-2013 及 EN1836
  • 雾度（广角散射光），标准：ISO12312.1-2013 (ISO12311)
  • 抗冲击（落球）测试，标准：ANSI Z80.3 及 21 CFR 801.410
  • 加强型强度测试，标准：EN1836
  • 镜片类型、光透射比与平均透光率，标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067、ANSI Z80.3、QB2457 及日本贴标要求等。
  • 镜片机械强度（最小强度），标准： ISO 12312.1 (ISO12311) 及 EN1836
  • 镜片表面质量，标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067、ANSI Z80.3 及 QB2457
  • 机械强度等级 1、2、3，标准：ISO12312.1-2013 (ISO12311)
  • 整副太阳镜镜架镍释出量，标准：EN12472 + EN16128、EN1836 及 EN ISO 12312.1-2013 备注
  • 光学密度，标准：ANSI Z80.3
  • 焦度计或验光仪法测光学度数（折射率），标准：ANSI Z80.3 及 GB10810.3
  • 望眼镜法测光学度数（球面、散光度数），标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067 等
  • 其他腐蚀、色牢度及力学测试
  • 偏光轴平面与偏振比率，标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067、ANSI Z80.3 及 GB10810.3
  • 棱镜差异（失衡），标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067、ANSI Z80.3 及 QB2457
  • 抗燃烧，标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067 等
  • 抗光辐射（老化测试），标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067、ANSI Z80.3 等
  • 强度，标准：S/NZS 1067
  • 散射光（光漫射测试），标准：EN1836 and AS/NZS 1067
  • 透光率均匀性（两片镜片之间的匹配），标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836 及 AS/NZS 1067
  • 单片镜片透光率变化，标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836 及 AS/NZS 1067
  • 防 UV/UVA/UVB（UV 范围特性），标准：ISO 12312.1-2013、EN1836、AS/NZS 1067、ANSI Z80.3 及 GB10810.3

我们可根据您的内部规范定制测试项目。联系我们，立即获取测试项目报价。
